title: Prime Property: Hot tips for home loans
text: Jul 28, 2015, 08.45 AM IST | Source: CNBC-TV18 Prime Property: Hot tips for home loans ICICI Bank gives tips on home loans. Prime Property spoke with Anup Saha, Head-Retail Secured Assets of ICICI Bank to give you the pulse check of the real estate market.
